title: "SoftBank-backed Korean edtech startup Riiid acquires Langoo, expands in Japan"
excerpt: "Riiid, a South Korea-headquartered AI-powered edtech company, acquired its Japanese distribution partner Langoo to expand its Japan footprint.  The acquisition comes after the company’s latest $175 million Series D round from SoftBank’s Vision Fund 2 in May."
